cells.data: -- needle -> haystack -> maybe (prefix before match, match + rest)

-- breakOnMay :: String -> String -> Maybe (String, String)on breakOnMay(pat, src)	if pat ≠ "" then		set {dlm, my text item delimiters} to {my text item delimiters, pat}				set lstParts to text items of src		if length of lstParts > 1 then			set mbTuple to Just(Tuple(item 1 of lstParts, pat & ¬				((items 2 thru -1 of lstParts) as text)))		else			set mbTuple to Just(Tuple(src, ""))		end if				set my text item delimiters to dlm		return mbTuple	else		Nothing()	end ifend breakOnMay
